questions.question: What is the primary purpose of ApeCoin in the Web3 economy?

options.A: To serve as the only currency for online transactions.
options.B: To support community-led initiatives that drive culture into the metaverse.
options.C: To replace traditional forms of governance with blockchain technology.
options.D: To provide a platform for gaming and entertainment only.

questions.fun_fact: ApeCoin is all about empowering a decentralized community to shape the future of digital culture.

questions.question: Who stewards the growth and development of the APE ecosystem?
questions.fun_fact: The APE Foundation acts as the base layer on which ApeCoin holders can build, not as an overseer.

questions.question: What does DAO stand for in the context of ApeCoin?
questions.fun_fact: DAOs are critical for decentralized governance, crucial to the success of globally dispersed communities.

questions.question: What exclusive access does ApeCoin provide?

options.A: Early access to all web3 games.
options.B: Exclusive games, merch, events, and services within its ecosystem.
options.D: Free transactions for all its holders.

questions.fun_fact: Holding ApeCoin unlocks parts of its ecosystem that are otherwise unavailable.

questions.question: How is ApeCoin's total supply managed?

options.A: It increases annually based on DAO decisions.
options.B: It decreases whenever a token is used for transactions.
options.C: It is permanently fixed with no capability for increase or decrease.
options.D: It is adjusted based on the performance of the ecosystem.

questions.fun_fact: With a total supply permanently fixed at 1 billion tokens, ApeCoin ensures scarcity and value retention.
